channel.title: Making a delta-scape client into a non delta client
channel.description:
is there any way possible i could change my client from a delta-scape client to a non delta-scape client? my client looks like this:[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/20rnxap.jpg[/img]
And i want it to look like this:[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mt8huo.jpg[/img] Without changing the server source to make it compatible.

item.title: Making a delta-scape client into a non delta client
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

It’s called a substance theme, http://javabyexample.wisdomplug.com/java-concepts/34-core-java/57-spice-up-your-swing-ui-with-substance.html

Read full topic
item.source: Making a delta-scape client into a non delta client

item.title: Making a delta-scape client into a non delta client
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Remove this: http://i41.tinypic.com/20rnxap.jpg

That isnt a “delta scape” client its simply a nice GUI. Get another client with it! iirc that was first realeased in Blurrs client.
